code: import{Flex,Text,useColorModeValue,Card,Box,Tag,TagLabel}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import'./Graphs.css';import Chart,{RadialLinearScale}from'chart.js/auto';import{ChartElement}from'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";Chart.register(RadialLinearScale);export default function BarChart(_ref){var axeX=_ref.axeX,axeY=_ref.axeY,nameChart=_ref.nameChart,backgroundColor=_ref.backgroundColor,borderColor=_ref.borderColor;var labels=axeX;var data={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:nameChart,data:axeY,backgroundColor:backgroundColor,borderColor:borderColor,borderWidth:2}]};var options={legend:{display:false},plugins:{tooltip:{display:false,events:['click']}}};var theme=useColorModeValue('dark','light');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{w:"100%",mr:2,p:5,border:theme==='light'?'solid 1px #474a54':'solid 1px #e2e8f0',borderRadius:"6px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:data,options:options})})});}
